alert.note: Alert for Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 02 at 7:26AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Panhandle Florida, including the following county, Bay. * WHEN...Until 830 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 626 AM CST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Millville, Bay Harbor, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, Brannonville, Magnolia Beach, College Station, St Andrews State Park, Biltmore Beach, Gulf Lagoon Beach and West Panama City. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
